en: I agree with your interpretation to a large extent.

en: I like that tie of yours.

en: I do not want to waste the best years of my life for you.

en: I like that about you.

en: I love you more than I can say.

en: I think of you all the time.

en: I want to make friends with your sister.

en: I can't imagine life without you.

en: I can understand you to some extent.

en: I will keep your advice in mind.

en: I'll tell you the truth.

en: I don't feel hostile toward you.

en: I want you to open the window.
